stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,由-ize+-ation组成,"……化"或"发展过程"

stems_affixes.word_buile: central中心的,中央的+ization……化→n.集中,中央集权化
industrial工业的,产业的+ization……化→n.工业化,产业化
organ器官,组织+ization……化→n.组织,团体,机构

word_mean: 组织：组织成或变为组织的过程
机化：血块由纤维组织取代
机构：有组织的实体、组或结构

entry.def: An organization is an official group of people, for example a political party, a business, a charity, or a club.

example.ex: Most of these specialized schools are provided by voluntary organizations.
example.tran: 这些专业学校大多由志愿组织建立。

example.ex: ...a report by the International Labour Organisation.

entry.def: The organization of an event or activity involves making all the necessary arrangements for it.

example.ex: ...the exceptional attention to detail that goes into the organisation of this event...
example.tran: 这次活动的组织筹备中对细节的特别关注

example.ex: Several projects have been delayed by poor organisation.
example.tran: 几个项目都因组织不力而被推迟。

entry.def: The organization of something is the way in which its different parts are arranged or relate to each other.

example.ex: I am aware that the organization of the book leaves something to be desired.
example.tran: 我知道该书的编排还有待改进。

means.word_mean: 1. a group of people who work together
2. an organized structure for arranging or classifying;

sentences.sentence: "he changed the arrangement of the topics"
"the facts were familiar but it was in the organization of them that he was original"
"he tried to understand their system of classification"

means.word_mean: 3. the persons (or committees or departments etc.) who make up a body for the purpose of administering something;

sentences.sentence: "he claims that the present administration is corrupt"
"the governance of an association is responsible to its members"
"he quickly became recognized as a member of the establishment"
"the constitution of a PTA group last year"
"it was the establishment of his reputation"
"he still remembers the organization of the club"

means.word_mean: 5. the act of organizing a business or business-related activity;

sentences.sentence: "he was brought in to supervise the organization of a new department"

means.word_mean: 6. the activity or result of distributing or disposing persons or things properly or methodically;

sentences.sentence: "his organization of the work force was very efficient"

means.word_mean: 7. an ordered manner; orderliness by virtue of being methodical and well organized;

sentences.sentence: "his compulsive organization was not an endearing quality"
"we can't do it unless we establish some system around here"
